prompts: Create a cute, small squirrel-like Pokemon with fluffy tails and bright colors.
Imagine a playful electric-type Pokemon that loves to gather nuts and climb trees.
Design a Pokemon with a round body, big eyes, and a cheerful expression.
Generate an adorable Pokemon that can spark electricity and has a bushy tail.
Show me a Pokemon that thrives in urban environments and is known for its speed.
Make a fluffy, blue-and-white Pokemon that enjoys playing in the forest.
Give me a tiny Pokemon that has the ability to generate static electricity.
